meanings.definition: The act of removing a coating or covering from something.
meanings.sent1: The uncoatings of the old paint revealed a beautiful wooden surface underneath.
meanings.sent2: After the uncoatings, the metal shone brightly in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The uncoatings of the cake frosting left a messy trail on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: Her uncoatings of emotions exposed her true feelings to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The uncoatings of the fog revealed a breathtaking view of the valley below.

meanings.definition: The state of being without a coating or covering.
meanings.sent1: The uncoatings of the table made it feel rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The uncoatings of the roof left it vulnerable to the rain.
meanings.sent3: The uncoatings of the ice cream cone made it melt quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent4: His uncoatings of armor left him exposed to the enemy's attacks.
meanings.sent5: The uncoatings of the forest floor revealed colorful leaves and insects below.
